thread.title: Donald Trump isn't happy about 'Saturday Night Live's' pee jokes
thread.title_full: Donald Trump isn't happy about 'Saturday Night Live's' pee jokes

author: Marcus Gilmer
title: Donald Trump isn't happy about 'Saturday Night Live's' pee jokes
text:
In what has become something of a weekly tradition, President-elect Donald Trump has once again responded to an unflattering portrayal of him on Saturday Night Live.
This time, however, people had some golden reactions to his tweet.
SEE ALSO: 'SNL' asks Trump about 'big Russian pee-pee parties' in first cold open of 2017
The skit , which featured Alec Baldwin again as Trump, made reference to that leaked, totally unverified dossier and the lurid allegations of, in the show's words, the "big Russian pee-pee party."
On Sunday evening, Trump finally responded.
. @NBCNews is bad but Saturday Night Live is the worst of NBC. Not funny, cast is terrible, always a complete hit job. Really bad television!
— Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) January 15, 2017
While the reply was pretty standard for Trump's relationship with the show, we're in a post-"pee pee party" world and Twitter was happy to oblige with another round of jokes .
Trump is sending those coded messages again. pic.twitter.com/nQH9gikBHQ
— Medjuh aye leet (@dobes) January 15, 2017
. @realDonaldTrump What are your thoughts on trickle-down pee-conomics?
— Gennefer Gross (@Gennefer) January 15, 2017
@realDonaldTrump the new episode is streaming on Hulu, Donny. It's tv gold. Really flows. Piss. pic.twitter.com/p3GREcIXFO
— Dakota Cairns (@iowegian92) January 15, 2017
@realDonaldTrump @NBCNews You mean SNL is complete "piss" job, don't you?! #Trump 's pee-pee tape.
— soapboxguy (@rheisler123) January 15, 2017
@realDonaldTrump Your frailty never disappoints. I'm surprised this took you so long. I mean, SNL really took the piss out of you, Donnie.
— Trump Fopdoodle (@trumpfopdoodle) January 15, 2017
@realDonaldTrump @NBCNews To be fair, last night's #SNL was piss poor. They don't need to #Apologize for the piss part, just the poor part!
— I'm President Trump (@DarthTaxEVader) January 15, 2017
BONUS: Even Fox News is defending CNN against Trump
